thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Saudi, Russia working on long-term oil alliance

title: EXCLUSIVE: Saudi, Russia working on long-term oil alliance
text:
EXCLUSIVE: Saudi, Russia working on long-term oil alliance 1:28am EDT - 01:44 
Saudi Arabia and Russia are working on a historic long-term pact that could extend controls over world crude supplies by major exporters for many years to come. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Saudi Arabia and Russia are working on a historic long-term pact that could extend controls over world crude supplies by major exporters for many years to come. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pLtDrU
